fn.p: How to cite this article: Huang J, Wu L, Ren X, Wu X, Chen Y, Ran G, Huang A, Huang L, Zhong D. Traditional Chinese medicine for corona virus disease 2019: a protocol for systematic review. Medicine. 2020;99:35(e21774).
JH, LW, and XDR contributed equally to this work and should be considered co-first authors.
This study was supported by Hospital of Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine (No.2017-D-YY-53).
The authors have no conflicts of interest to disclose.
The datasets generated during and/or analyzed during the current study are publicly available.
